Description: String of 43 glazed composition and glass beads and pendants of various shapes and dimensions: two glazed composition grooved bicone beads and two grooved spherical beads; red, orange, green, blue and white globular glass beads; string also contains a number of striated glass short cylindrical beads.
Curator's comments: Concerning glass beads, see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 79 § 79; concerning glazed composition beads, see ibid., p. 75 § 72.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 75 § 72, p. 79 § 79)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.86, p.187, pl.29)
